name: Build Career Profile
Description: Compose your career profile with context standards and identifiers to showcase your assessed competencies in the sector of your expertise.HaHuJobs offers you a simple, clear and easy to use platform to help you stand out from the crowd of candidates. The service enables you to compose your CV, help you evaluate your skills and apply for vacancies published on the HaHuJobs platforms

name: Job Application
Description: Apply for jobs with just a few clicks, and track the progress of your applications through notifications on multiple platforms. Revolutionize your job applications with pre-prepared application materials and an option to select what best fits your application. Using your HaHuJobs account you will be able to apply with only a few clicks and track its status

name: Vacancy Notification
Description: Take advantage of every job opportunity using our multi-platform vacancy notification services for jobseekers. Subscribe to a sector of your choice with various specific notification specifications to receive the latest options that fit your career profile. With multi platform, tailored and configurable subscription options you will never miss a vacancy of your interest.
